ComicInfo.Summary: A villain called Leaper Logan escapes from prison and starts stealing from people and places. Can anyone stop him? Speedball is on the case in “Leaper Logan.” Script by Steve Ditko & Roger Stern and art by Steve Ditko & Bruce Patterson. Then kung fu master and movie star Chick Harris visits Robbie’s high school. But during the assembly, a gang takes everyone hostage and Speedball has to do something in “For Kicks.” Script by Jo Duffy and art by Steve Ditko & Bruce Patterson.
